item.description: OK so I know that many members have been to this museum but this will be my first time. The second Saturday of each month the Wadsworth Atheneum hosts Second Saturdays For Families:  I called and checked you don't have to have children or steal someone's else kids to get free admission. We just have to be there before 1 pm. If interested in joining me please RSVP Yes. We will meet near the admission area @ 11 am. See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet @ admission area 11 am. I will also provide my tel # a couple of days before to YES RSVP's. Thanks Joleta
item.name: Second Saturdays @ The Wadsworth Atheneum (Free Admission)
